title: Marabou Stork Nightmares
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: I slung my spade in the woods by the River Almond, which reached the Forth estuary at the old Cramond village. Then I went for a coffee at the small cafe in the village.

title: The Unbearable Lightness of Scones
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: "And at the back of the farm," Angus continued, "there was the River Almond. You probably know it.
